name: Close Up Anal + Creampie LoRA
description:
A LoRA for creating close up shots of anal sex in various poses and angles.

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

Vaginal version here: Close up Vaginal + Creampie LoRA

Use the suggested trigger words to get the type of shot you want:

  • Doggystyle

  • Missionary

  • POV

  • From Side

They work in combination with each other, although some of them combine better than others. While testing I found that 'doggystyle from side' is least reliable, while 'doggystyle pov' and 'missionary pov' seem to work the best.

As always, you can use 'creampie' to add creampies to any of these. They don't look very realistic currently, but there needs to be some room for improvement, right?

Due to the amount of different angles used in this LoRA it can create some rather unpleasant body horror from time to time, so be prepared for that.

Recommended LoRA strength 0.7-0.8.

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge

If you like this, you may also like my other LoRAs.
